sentences.en: New ideas and technologies in proteomics would impregnate new activities for the development of BNF.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质组学新思想、新技术的引入,为固氮研究的发展注入了新的活力.

sentences.en: Norman's efforts to impregnate her failed.
sentences.cn: 诺曼想使她怀孕的努力失败了。

sentences.en: The purpose of the marinade is to impregnate foods with the flavour of the ingredients.
sentences.cn: 使用腌泡汁的目的是使配料的味道浸透到食物中去.

sentences.en: These organics impregnate large volumes of sandstone.
sentences.cn: 这种有机质渗入了大面积的砂岩.

sentences.en: To impregnate with fragrance; impart a pleasant odor to.
sentences.cn: 野草 泛起 一股怡人的香味.

sentences.en: Two Methods: Used to liquid impregnate carbon fiber preform are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了液相浸渍炭纤维坯体的两种方法.

sentences.en: Undercover officers found drug-making equipment used to impregnate paper with LSD.
sentences.cn: 卧底警官发现了用于使迷幻药渗入纸张的毒品制造设备。

trans.tran_cn: 使怀孕, 使受精, 使充满, 注入, 灌输
trans.tran_en: to make a woman or female animal pregnant
